select c.* ,d.originfile as photo_originfile, d.savefile as photo_savefile, d.savefolder as photo_savefolder from (select a.* ,b.originfile as video_originfile, b.savefile as video_savefile, b.savefolder as video_savefolder from (select i.ind_index, i.ind_resume as resume_index, f.savefolder as resume_savefolder,f.originfile as resume_originfile,f.savefile as resume_savefile,i.ind_video as video_index,i.ind_photo as photo_index, i.ind_switch, i.ind_introduce from ind_profile i left outer join file_info f on i.ind_resume = f.fil_index) a left outer join file_info b on a.video_index = b.fil_index) c left outer join file_info d on c.photo_index = d.fil_index where c.ind_index = #{index};
